name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: This lecture is a summary of this whole course.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _First
column6: let's revisit the topics that we covered in this course. _

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _In the beginning
column6: we talked about the natural language processing and _

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: how it can enrich text representation.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _We then talked about how to mine knowledge about the language

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _natural language used to express the

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: what's observing the world in text and data.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _In particular
column6: we talked about how to mine word associations. _

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: We then talked about how to analyze topics in text.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: How to discover topics and analyze them.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt

column6: how to mine opinions and do sentiment analysis. _

text: _And finally

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: do with predicting values of other real world variables based on text data.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _And in discussing this

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _which can contribute additional predictors for the prediction problem

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _and also can provide context for analyzing text data

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: in particular we talked about how to use context to analyze topics.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: So here are the key high-level take away messages from this cost.

text: I going to go over these major topics and

text: point out what are the key take-away messages that you should remember.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: First the NLP and text representation.

text: any text replication because it enriches text representation.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _And this further enables more accurate knowledge discovery

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _to discover deeper knowledge

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _However
column6: the current estate of art of natural energy processing is

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: still not robust enough.

text: _So

text: And that is why the search engine is very important.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _So
column7: I want to remind you of this big picture for _

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: harnessing big text data that I showed you at your beginning of the semester.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt

column6: to deal with a big text application system

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _we need two kinds text

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _And text retrieval
column7: is to help convert big text data into _

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _a small amount of most relevant data for a particular problem

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _providing knowledge provenance

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: Text mining has to do with further analyzing the relevant data to discover

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: the actionable knowledge that can be directly useful for decision making or

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: many other tasks.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: So this course covers text mining.

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: And there's a companion course called Text Retrieval and

name: 5 - 11 - 4.11 Course Summary (00-18-36).srt
text: _If you haven't taken that course
column6: it would be useful for you to take it

text: especially if you are interested in building a text caching system.

text: And taking both courses will give you a complete set of practical skills for

text: building such a system.
